attributes.action: we want a Gynaecology ward at worthing hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: hi we would like to ask for a Gynaecology ward to come back to worthing hosptail as we no longer have one as they only have 4 day case beds and if you have to stay in you get shiped off to another ward which could be anywhere in the hospatal

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your NHS Primary Care Trust.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
